name: Attack
text: Deal 2 damage to a single target.

name: Heal
text: Restore 2 HP to a single ally.

name: Shield
text: Grant 1 Armor to a single ally.

name: Spiked Shield
text: Grant 1 Armor. When hit, deal 1 damage back.

name: Fireball
text: Deal 1 damage to a single target. Ignores Armor.

name: Stab
text: Deal 1 damage and apply Bleed (1 dmg at start of enemy’s turn).

name: Sweep
text: Deal 1 damage to up to two adjacent targets.

name: Freeze
text: Stun a target for 1 turn (skip its next action).

name: Crag Shot
text: Deal 1 damage and reduce target’s Armor by 1 this turn.

name: Chain Lightning
text: Deal 1 damage to a target; jumps to another target for 1 damage.

name: Attack+
text: Deal 2 damage. If target has a condition, deal +1.

name: Heal+
text: Restore 3 HP to a single ally.

name: Shield+
text: Grant 2 Armor to a single ally.

name: Spiked Shield+
text: Grant 1 Armor. When hit, deal 2 damage back.

name: Fireball+
text: Deal 2 damage that ignores Armor.

name: Stab+
text: Deal 2 damage and apply Bleed (2 dmg at start of enemy’s turn).

name: Sweep+
text: Deal 2 damage split among up to two adjacent targets.

name: Freeze+
text: Stun a target for 1 turn and reduce its Armor by 1.

name: Crag Shot+
text: Deal 2 damage and strip 1 Armor.

name: Chain Lightning+
text: Deal 1 damage that chains to up to 2 additional targets.

name: Bomb
text: Place a bomb on a tile; explodes for 2 area damage next turn.

name: Concentration
text: Your next die this turn gains +2.

name: Poison
text: Apply Poison (1 damage at end of target’s turn, 3 turns).

name: Attack++
text: Deal 3 damage. If target has a condition, deal +2.

name: Heal++
text: Restore 4 HP to a single ally.

name: Shield++
text: Grant 3 Armor to a single ally.

name: Spiked Shield++
text: Grant 2 Armor. When hit, deal 3 damage back.

name: Fireball++
text: Deal 3 damage that ignores Armor.

name: Stab++
text: Deal 3 damage and apply Bleed (3 dmg at start of enemy’s turn).

name: Sweep++
text: Deal 3 damage split among up to two adjacent targets.

name: Freeze++
text: Stun a target for 2 turns.

name: Crag Shot++
text: Deal 3 damage and strip 2 Armor.

name: Chain Lightning++
text: Deal 2 damage that chains to up to 3 additional targets.
